issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: The {{deselectItem}} method on the {{Ti.UI.ListView}} has been iOS-only since the beginning. Now that RecyclerView will be added to Android, it should be considered to remove this parity gap and add parity on the method. It cleans up a looot of conditional code, just like the {{selectionStyle}} property would - but that's another one.
fields.summary: Android: Parity with iOS for Ti.UI.ListView#deselectItem
